RootMetaData.description: This project is a non-commercial clone portfolio inspired by the 247 website. It recreates the experience of high-end billiard tables, ping-pong tables, and premium dumbbells to demonstrate luxury furniture-style UI and interactive web development skills using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. All rights to the original brand belong to the brand owner.

ContactPage.title: Inquiry
ContactPage.description: Contact us for a price quote or if you require further information. Our team will respond shortly.

story.label: The Beginning
story.body: 247 Billiards was founded in 2012 by Michael Steininger. The basis for today’s know-how is the many years of experience in the family business Steininger Metallbearbeitung, founded in 1975. This knowledge and passion for exclusive design is reflected in our lifestyle products.

rethinkingHero.headline: Re—thinking the norm
rethinkingHero.description: We constantly challenge the status quo to transform the old familiar into something new and unique.

items.title: Billiard
items.subTitle: Porsche Design Pool Table
items.content: For the design of our first product we turned to the renowned Porsche Design Studio in Zell am See, Austria. The design language was to correspond to the purist, exclusive design philosophy of Porsche Design. This enabled us to quickly win over customers who have the highest standards of design and quality.

items.title: Table Tennis
items.subTitle: Premium Ping-Pong Table
items.content: The increasing demand for table tennis equipment with a similarly purist, modern design has encouraged us to add our unique table tennis table to our range in 2021. The perfect addition to our premium lifestyle products.

items.title: Workout
items.subTitle: Exclusive Dumbbell-Set
items.content: Exclusive private home gyms, hotel and yacht gyms are becoming increasingly popular with discerning customers — the demand for high-quality training equipment is growing. The product portfolio was therefore expanded in 2020 to include an exclusive dumbbell set with a matching dumbbell rack.

items.title: Selected Metals
items.content: The highly precise processing of metals is one of the core competencies of 247Billiards. That is why the structure of our game tables is mainly made of aluminum and high-quality stainless steel. Due to the long experience in metalworking, maximum precision and processing quality can be guaranteed.

items.title: Unique Corian
items.content: Worldwide unique is the use of the high-end material Corian for the surface of the billiard table. The thermal deformation of Corian and the silky mate appearance create a dynamic and exquisite design aesthetic. In cooperation with the Corian manufacturer HASENKOPF in Mehring, Germany, we create design billiard tables, which are absolutely unique due to the materiality and its processing.

items.title: Genuine Leather
items.content: In addition to the design, the feel of a product is also an important feature to focus on. For this purpose, the dumbbell handles are covered with the finest genuine leather, which provides a pleasant, velvety-soft grip feeling. The ball pockets of the billiard table are also made of leather not only because of the beautiful appearance – it also ensures a soft, noise-absorbing sinking of the balls in the pockets.

hero.lead: Crafting exclusive lifestyle products that inspire.

lifestyleHero.subheading: Luxury pool tables, ping-pong tables and dumbbells for your exclusive lifestyle.

items.text: I’ve been using the pool table from 247 for four years now and am still very happy with it. I was particularly impressed by the service. The tables are delivered on a worldwide basis, and a specially trained fitter assembled the pool table in my home. I can definitely recommend the pool tables from 247Billiards!
items.author: KELVIN CHAANG

items.text: I have not seen anything quite like this!! On a jet plane from Austria, the pool table arrived to its cottage home accompanied by its guardian installers – Michael and Gitano. With its modern, minimal design, innovative material concept and unmistakable signature look inspired by Porsche, it’s here, level and ready for a few blood tests, bottom spins and cannons.
items.author: WENDY SNELGROVE
items.location: Cabin Couture by WLS Design - Toronto/Canada

items.text: We’ve treated ourselves to a sleek black pool table from 247Billiards for our lounge on the 13th floor of the Schwabinger Tor skyscraper in Munich. It had to be delivered in lots of individual parts and assembled with great care – 247Billiards did the job to perfection! The Porsche Design pool table now stands in the center of the room overlooking Munich and is an instant eye-catcher for staff and guests. Many thanks to 247Billiards!
items.author: HARALD ADELHARDT

items.text: We purchased the billiard table back in 2015. 247Billiards’ staff are very professional. The delivery and installation time went very efficiently.
items.author: EDGARD BARONA

designPitch.title: Clean, minimalist and functional design at the highest level.
designPitch.subtitle: Customizable to fit your exclusive private interiors and new work spaces.

aboutUs.title: About—us
aboutUs.intro: As an Austrian manufacturer with local production we strive to craft outstanding lifestyle experiences.
aboutUs.paragraph1: Since the beginning, our passion has been to create exclusive lifestyle products that inspire. Every product is manufactured with the utmost care – piece by piece.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Maximum precision in processing as well as the use of carefully selected materials are our priorities. 247 Billiards stands for highest quality “Made in Austria”.

studioCollabShowcase.headline: Designed with Studio F. A. Porsche
studioCollabShowcase.description: Our first product was created in collaboration with <highlight>Studio F.A. Porsche</highlight> in Zell am See, Austria — embodying the studio's purist and timeless design philosophy.

intro.headline: Discover our designer pieces that blend seamlessly into your home.

ProjectsPage.title: In The Spotlight
ProjectsPage.description: Discover our exclusive projects, global exhibitions and news about our brand.

projects.title: Los Angeles luxury dumbbell set project
projects.subTitle: Los Angeles Client Exclusive Dumbbell Set
projects.content: For his exclusive home gym, our customer wanted a very special eye-catcher and opted for our unique weight rack. Made of oak, this offers space for 6 pairs of dumbbells weighing 2-12 kg. The weights are made of stainless steel and the handles are covered with leather for a unique soft grip. A special designer piece for exclusive home gyms.

projects.title: Luxury Pool Table Monaco Penthouse
projects.subTitle: Luxury 247 Pool Table for Monaco Penthouse
projects.content: For our customer in Monaco, we were allowed to produce an 8-foot luxury pool table in the Corian color Deep Nocturne. The cloth color in a modern Tournament Blue. The colors of the Porsche Design pool table should match the colors of the rest of the exclusive and modern interior of the entire penthouse. The customer can now look forward to many wonderful and exciting hours on this luxurious pool table. A very successful project for 247Billiards and another exclusive pool table for our customers all over the world.

projects.title: Porsche Design pool table for Luxemburg project
projects.subTitle: Design Pool Table for client in Luxembourg
projects.content: A very special project for our customer in Luxembourg. We have furnished an exclusive Porsche Design pool table for a wonderful and exclusive private residence. The color of the pool table is modern designer white with a red cloth cover. This was a perfect match for the contemporary and modern interior of this luxury property. With this project, 247Billiards was able to integrate another exclusive pool table in a wonderful setting.

projects.title: 247 pool table for luxury residence in Los Angeles
projects.subTitle: Porsche Design pool table Los Angeles
projects.content: This project took us to a special customer in Los Angeles, California in the USA. Our 247 pool table was selected by Porsche Design Studio for luxury interiors throughout the house and for the entertainment area. The colors of the entire interior were very bright and so was the pool table in Glacier White selected with an equally bright cloth color in the color ecru. In summary, one of our most exclusive projects and we are proud to have set up our pool table in such a contemporary setting as this luxury designer villa.

projects.title: Toronto exclusive billiard table project
projects.subTitle: Design pool table for Toronto project
projects.content: For this exclusive project, our Porsche Design pool table was ordered in a two-tone version. In keeping with the rest of the interior of this luxury home in Toronto, Canada, Glacier White with Deep Nocturne (black) was chosen for the exterior color. Plus a Simonis billiard towel in purple. An extravagant pool table that is as unique as our customers.

projects.title: London Penthouse luxury table tennis table
projects.subTitle: Designer table tennis table for London Penthouse
projects.content: A very special project took us to London. A customer ordered our luxury table tennis table for his particularly exclusive penthouse in the middle of the City of London. The table tennis table was ordered in oak, which was particularly suited to the rest of the interior of this luxury penthouse. Exciting games on an exclusive table tennis table are now also provided for our customers in London.
